website_summaries.verdict: Adidas Originals’ NMD Human Race shoes live up to the brand’s tradition of comfort and quality and Pharrell Williams’ cool sense of style. They bank on the much-vaunted Boost and the brilliant use of colors. The messages printed across the uppers enhance their casual streetwear vibe.Adidas NMD Human Race x Pharrell Williams sneakers are highly coveted and very few regret buying these. Aside from the shoes’ looks and comfort, they’re also highly collectible.
pros: The looks of Pharrell Williams x Adidas Human Race NMDs got the most thumbs up from reviewers who like the overall aesthetics of the shoes
The shoes’ comfort level has been commended by many users who said the shoes felt just as good on the feet as the Adidas Yeezy 350 Boosts
Several people have remarked that the shoes’ uppers look more like mesh than Primeknit but they like the fact that those felt soft and stretchy
The available colorways of the NMD Human Race kicks got a lot of mentions from purchasers who say the colors look bright and “sick.”
Some consumers have cited the shoes’ quality as premium
The shoes have a creative and unique lacing system that a few customers have praised as incredible
A buyer has happily noted that the Pharrell Williams x Adidas Human Race NMDs held their shape nicely even when not worn
The shoes go great with casual wear but can easily be styled up, one individual has observed
cons: The place where the ankle sits feels a bit tight, according to a few reviewers
The shoes don’t feel secure enough, some users have noted
Like other NMD shoes, the NMD Human Race doesn’t contain removable insoles which testers observed would have made the shoe so much better

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look good package sent feels questionable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes did not come in an original adidas box and when purchasing new I expect this (-1). There was one tag that seems printed well, although, adidas tennis HU are supposed to have 2 as far as I know. The first being one w/ barcode and size info and material info on the reverse. There’s a second set of alternate/reserve laces which were absent on my order (-1). Most details on the sneaker itself appear to be there and the build quality seems legit on my order everywhere else. My review is for one vender only “TheChicagoSneakerStore” intended to inform only on what was sent to me and in what condition.
customer_reviews.author: Roost

customer_reviews.title: Trendy shoe, but buy half a size down
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews here advising me to go half a size down from my original size because this shoe runs long. That advice was spot on! This shoe is nice and trendy, I'm happy with my purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Pw adidas Tennis Hu
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are pretty fly period. Most of all their comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: LTR

customer_reviews.title: What a versatile and insanely comfortable sneaker. They look cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to travel around Asia. What a versatile and insanely comfortable sneaker. They look cool, feel great, and stay relatively clean for a light shoe. Planning on snagging these in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Makes me wonder about the people claiming the items they received are fakes. Bought these and not only did they arrive early by a considerable amount of time but they arrived in the original box, had tags, and are absolutely legitimate. Extremely lightweight and comfy and they look great. Couldn't have asked for a better purchased especially since the price was half of what these usually go for. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Spoogey

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are one of the most comfortable pairs of shoes I've ever worn. They're incredibly light weight. After reading reviews prior to ordering, I ordered a 1/2 size smaller than I'd usually wear. I'm glad I did. Thank you other reviewers! I definitely recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these. I really like this style. Easy to slip on without messing with laces and it feels like a sturdy sock, lol. I hope they continue making these for a while in all sorts of color ways.
customer_reviews.author: dngn0

customer_reviews.title: I wasnt disappointed. I looked all over the internet for these ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt disappointed. I looked all over the internet for these sneakers and finally found them here on Amazon for a decent price. Its a comfortable shoe, although a tad bit big. They're very nice looking on.

customer_reviews.title: Fly sneaks that are light and comfy

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable but three things
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable but three things. 1) my feet have stretched out the front and there’s a toe stretch mark from that. 2) there’s a seam at the front of the shoe inside that my toes get caught on. 3) the bit on the back where you would pull the shoe on gets flipped up all the time. Other than these minor annoyances I like the shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I could've went a half size smaller. I'm a women's size 10 and I bought a men's size 9. But with some socks they'll be fine. The color is beautiful and will match my steelers wear perfect. I'm so glad I took a risk and made the purchase. I highly recommend this shoe!

customer_reviews.title: They look great and feel good just walking around or wearing on ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great and feel good just walking around or wearing on casual days at work. They aren't great if you are taking a walk doing more than being very passive. I'd still buy them, but I kick them off immediately after work and don't bike in them.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish shoe. Definitely runs large so I recommend going down at least a half size. I love everything about them minus one thing. The toe guard inside of the shoe is noticeable when wearing them but you do get used to it after awhile. I know it’s there to keep the shape of the shoe but if it was smaller or gone the shoe would definitely be a 5/5 in comfort. Other than that it’s great lifestyle shoe and extremely lightweight. Had to return to bump it up to 5 stars. I still wear these all the time and they are easily some of the most comfortable shoes I own

customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman’s size 7 and the 5 in men’s fit

customer_reviews.text: The shoe size fits as expected but had the difficulty in putting my feet inside the shoe because of the shoe design.

I have another pair that I bought at the adidas store so I ordered the same size again. These are a full size larger and they are both 10.5 mens. Not sure why this is, I'm pretty disappointed the sizes would be different.

Absolutely love the look of this sneaker.

I know that because of the material they can get dirty really easy... but as a new “unboxed” shoe cant figure how. Btw, i had to go a whole size down to fit perfect. They are really confy.

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Pharrell Williams Human Race Ice Blue/Ice Blue/Blue 6 D US
product_meta.description: Style: modern, sporty. Cut: Low Shank Closure: lacing. Inner sole: absorbent, removable. SOLE: non slip, textured rubber sole. Outsole: cushioning plastic sole. Shaft: elastic, sock-like fit (closed). Lace: Sole partially above the toe, soft toe area. Heel: logo on heel
